Producer: Jason Blum, Daniel Farrands, Casey La Scala
Production Co: E1 Entertainment, Miramax, Blumhouse Productions, Dimension Films, LDMP
Rating: PG-13 (Disturbing Horror Violence|Brief Language|Suggestive Images|Terror|Thematic Material)
Synopsis: A mother moves with her three children into the notorious, supposedly haunted Amityville house to try using its dark powers to cure her comatose son.
Title: Amityville: The Awakening
